name: Bits'N'Picas Bitmap Font File
summary: Learn about .KBITS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: KBITS files are saved in a proprietary format that can only be opened by Bits'N'Picas. The program can also open .SFD, .BDF, .SUIT, .DFONT, FZX, HMZK, DSF, and SBF files. When you are finished modifying your font in a KBITS file, you can export it to a .TTF, BDF, NFNT, SUIT, DFONT, SFONT, RFONT, FZX, HMZK, SBF, or .PNG file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
